title: Romeo Beckham, 17, channels dad David's iconic noughties braids as he reveals new hairstyle
text:
He was been spotted ripping off his dad David's early 2000s style before when he sported hooped earrings at the Capital FM Summertime Ball.

And Romeo Beckham was channelling yet another of David's iconic noughties looks as he debuted a new braided hairstyle while shopping for jewellery for mum Victoria and brother Cruz in LA on Wednesday,

The teen, 17, oozed confidence as he revealed his newly plaited locks, swept back from his face and gathered in a ponytail, very much like the look David sported back in 2003 when he headed to the England training camp.

Like father, like son: Romeo Beckham was channelling yet another of dad David's iconic noughties looks as he debuted a new braided hairstyle in LA on Wednesday

Mirroring his father's penchant for bling back in the day, Romeo donned sparkling diamond earrings and a chunky silver chain.

Romeo teamed his throwback look with a white and blues striped polo shirt and cream shorts as he joined brother Cruz, 14, who wore a red striped shirt,

Escorting the pair on their jewellery shopping trip was Spice Girl mum Victoria, 45, who cut an uncharacteristically casual figure in black workout gear and a baseball cap.

The fashion designer showcased her lean legs in black leggings, forgoing the heels for neon trainers.

Seeing double: The teen, 17, oozed confidence as he revealed his newly plaited locks, swept back from his face and gathered in a ponytail, very much like the look David sported back in 2003 when he headed to the England training camp

Spitting image: Mirroring his father's penchant for bling back in the day, Romeo donned sparkling diamond earrings and a chunky silver chain (David pictured R in 2003)

She swept her hair up into a stylish updo with a radiant palette of make-up accentuating her pretty features.

David was known for mixing things up when it came to fashion - spurred on, no doubt, by his now-designer wife.

Posh and Becks were truly at their blingy best in their 2002-2007 era, when David played for Real Madrid before transferring to LA Galaxy in the US.

Victoria had recently embarked on a solo music career. Her debut single was a garage track - Out Of Your Mind - but her solo album was more traditionally pop.

However, she recorded two subsequent albums, which were eventually shelved, one being a dance record, the other R&B influenced.

At the time, she was known to wear outfits befitting an R&B star, such as her Rock & Republic jeans line.

Lookalikes: Romeo smiled as he showed off his bold new look in homage to his father (R in 2003)

While David carried on sporting flowing shirts, chains and ear studs, Posh went bleach blonde for the family's move to America, trying out loud statement jewelry and much-less conservative outfits to what we expect from her today.

Romeo's outing comes amid claims he is dating model Mia 'Mimi' Moocher.

Mia and Romeo sparked romance rumours earlier this year when the model joined him at a private family dinner in celebration of his mother Victoria Beckham's fashion show.

The pair enjoyed another day out together earlier this month when they visited one of London's Tate galleries.

Last month Romeo and Mia were pictured arriving together for Victoria's dinner at Harry's Bar in Mayfair.

Low key:Escorting the pair on their jewellery shopping trip was Spice Girl mum Victoria, 45, who cut an uncharacteristically casual figure in black workout gear and a baseball cap

Throw-beck: Romeo channelled his dad's style back in June at the Capital FM Summertime Ball [David, pictured R, in 2003]

Romeo was pictured wearing a light blue shirt and striped trousers with box fresh white trainers after sitting in the FROW with the rest of his famous family.

And Mimi shared a video of the catwalk from inside the show on her Instagram stories soon after attending.

She also shared a picture of Romeo on her Instagram on his birthday on September 1, writing: 'Haps smiley bday Romo' alongside a heart emoji.

Several of her pals commented, writing things like: 'you guys are the cutest!!' and 'u2 are so [heart].'

Mimi is followed by both Cruz and Romeo and it's not known how long they have known one another.
